name: Nina/Tess
_source: speak;Nina; You're fast, it would be shame to see that talent go to waste...{w}
speak;Tess; I ain't that fast lady...{w} I saw the way you fight in battle when I was running.
speak;Nina; Nonsense! Everyone has their own way to be fast.| How about this? {w}I can train you to be faster.| Maybe the way of the bow? All you got to do is join us.{w}
speak;Tess;You have yourself a deal!| (Learning her ways will help my family.){w}
